article.title: Spain: ECJ Rules Inheritance Tax Discriminatory
article.description: The European Court of Justice (ECJ) has ruled that Spain is in breach of European Union treaties by imposing a higher rate of gift and inheritance taxes on non-residents.

article.title: UK: Remittance Basis Restricted For Loan Collateral
article.description: HMRC has announced the sudden withdrawal of a concession whereby foreign income and gains used as loan collateral were not considered to have been remitted to the UK.
